title: Nangan Battlefield Tour
subTitle: 南竿戰地巡禮：地下坑道與媽祖信仰
intro: A shocking journey into the Cold War front line. Explore the Beihai Tunnel dug by hand and the Iron Fort on a reef.

spots.name: Matsu Giant Statue (媽祖巨神像)
spots.description: A 28.8m high statue overlooking the sea. The deck is shaped like a ship, symbolizing Matsu protecting fishermen.

spots.name: Beihai Tunnel (北海坑道)
spots.description: An underground dock carved into granite. Take a boat ride to see the chisel marks and (at night) the Blue Tears.

spots.name: Iron Fort (鐵堡)
spots.description: An independent reef fortress. See the soldiers' living quarters and even a military dog shelter carved inside.

title: Beigan Mediterranean Vibe
subTitle: 北竿地中海風情：芹壁石屋與壁山
intro: Visit the 'Mediterranean of the East'. Qinbi Village offers the best-preserved Eastern Min architecture and stunning sea views.

spots.name: Bishan Observatory (壁山觀景台)
spots.description: The highest peak in Matsu. Enjoy a panoramic view of the airport runway and the surrounding islands.

spots.name: Qinbi Village (芹壁聚落)
spots.description: Stone houses built along the hillside. Look for the 'anti-communist slogans' on the walls and enjoy coffee by the sea.

spots.name: Tanghoudao Beach (塘后道沙灘)
spots.description: A sandbar connecting the airport and Houao Mountain. The sand is incredibly fine and white. Great for plane spotting.

title: Classic Twin Islands
subTitle: 經典雙星：南竿北竿全覽與藍眼淚
intro: The standard Matsu itinerary. Chase the Blue Tears in Nangan and meet the Sika Deer on Daqiu Island.

spots.name: Blue Tears at Beihai Tunnel (北海坑道藍眼淚)
spots.description: The only guaranteed spot to see Blue Tears (noctiluca scintillans) via a guided night boat tour. Reservation required.

spots.name: Daqiu Island (大坵島)
spots.description: An uninhabited island inhabited by wild Sika Deer. Take a short boat ride from Beigan to feed the deer.

spots.name: Tunnel 88 (八八坑道)
spots.description: Smell the aroma of aging Kaoliang liquor. The tunnel maintains a constant cool temperature perfect for storage.

title: Matsu Art Island Tour
subTitle: 藝文慢旅：馬祖國際藝術島巡禮
intro: Turning cold war heritage into art spaces. Stay in a bunker hostel and explore art installations in old power plants.

spots.name: 55 Hostel (55據點背包客棧)
spots.description: Sleep inside a former military bunker. The windows are original gun embrasures offering stunning sea views.

spots.name: Jinsha Village (津沙聚落)
spots.description: A revitalized golden sand village. Explore the alleyways and try local old wine (Laojiu) products.

spots.name: Beigan Power Plant (北竿電廠)
spots.description: A retired power plant transformed into an art exhibition space, telling the story of the island's energy history.

title: Ecology & Mythology
subTitle: 生態與神話：南竿、北竿、大坵深度
intro: Slow down and dive deep. Read books in a sea-cliff bunker, hike the Luobang Mountain, and stay in a stone house.

spots.name: Thorn Bird Coffee (刺鳥咖啡書店)
spots.description: A cafe located in the former Stronghold 12. Enjoy coffee and books underground with the sound of waves.

spots.name: Luobang Mountain Trail (螺蚌山自然步道)
spots.description: A scenic trail along the ridge line. Requires some physical fitness but offers breathtaking cliff views.

spots.name: War and Peace Memorial Park (戰爭和平紀念公園)
spots.description: Learn about the military history of Matsu. The park offers great vantage points over the surrounding islets.

title: Dongju Lighthouse Nostalgia
subTitle: 遺世獨立：南竿+東莒島燈塔懷舊
intro: Travel to the remote Dongju Island where time stands still. Perfect for photography, stargazing, and finding inner peace.

spots.name: Dongju Lighthouse (東莒島燈塔)
spots.description: Built in 1872 with granite. Notice the unique white windbreak wall designed to protect the keeper's kerosene lamp.

spots.name: Fuzheng Settlement (福正聚落)
spots.description: A quiet village below the lighthouse. At night, you can step on 'star sand' (bioluminescent algae) on the beach.

spots.name: Mysterious Little Bay (神祕小海灣)
spots.description: A secluded bay with dramatic sea erosion landscapes. A legendary spot associated with Lu Dongbin.
